title: You should get free chromas when you reach rank 5 on the champions mastery
body: is so easy to do chromas i have even seen a guy do 10 chromas pack of the new lux in less than 10 minutes

replies.body:
Sure, fans make chromas fast. But they don't concider what colors would fit the best. They just test some wierd shit and call it done, even though it has no actual clarity, removing all past traces of what the skin actually is.

Also the quality was bad on them. It's not about recoloring the entire model, it's about recoloring parts of them PROFESSIONALLY, not like an amateur.
You getting downvoted for this is proof that the community is beyond repair.
